data.message: How about you MAKE you're bottles out of 100% recycled plastic. You say they can be used to make new bottles, yet you won't even do this yourselves!!

replies.message: Hi Tom, currently we use 25% recycled plastic and have committed to doubling the amount to 50%, by 2020. We’d like to use more but there’s not enough recycled plastic in the UK at the moment, we need more bottles to be recycled. This is why as part of our strategy we will be seeking reform of the recycling system in the UK to improve recovery and recycling rates.
Glad Coca-Cola are committing to that! And I agree the country needs to get much better in its recycling efforts.
